mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, LOCATION.* FROM LOCATION ORDER BY IDX DESC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT ( SELECT count(*) FROM LIKE_LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_IDX = tloc.IDX AND MEMBER_IDX = (select idx from member where username = #{usename}) ) as liked , tloc.* FROM LOCATION tloc

select l.name, l.PHONE_NUMBER, l.BUSINESS_HOURS, l.ADDRESS ,ll.LOCATION_IDX, ll.MEMBER_IDX from location l join like_location ll on idx = ll.location_idx where ll.member_idx in (select idx from member where username=#{username})

SELECT count(*) FROM LIKE_LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_IDX = #{locationIdx} AND MEMBER_IDX = (select idx from member where username = #{usename})
